title: Contributing to neighborhood safety and care
description: Contributing to neighborhood safety and care
content:
Scenario: Contributing to neighborhood safety and care
    Given Jordan notices a neighbor's package left in the rain
    And Jordan knows the neighbor from previous interactions
    When Jordan alerts their support worker to the situation
    Then the support worker helps Jordan address the concern
    And the neighbor's package is protected from damage
    And Jordan's observant care contribution is recognized
    And the neighborhood_elohim records Jordan's care action
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for neighborhood care
    And Jordan experiences being a contributing community member
    And neighbors recognize Jordan as someone who looks out for others
